LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon_Category.label: large weapon organ
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon_Category.description: This weapon organ is extremely large, and only large Arachne insects (size 2.0 or higher) can use this weapon.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Category.label: special weapon organ
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Category.description: This weapon organ not only deals normal damage, but can also cause other effects.
